definitions.example: I'll just give this knife a quick rinse.

definitions.definition: A liquid used to rinse, now particularly a hair dye.
To wash (something) quickly using water and no soap.
definitions.example: You'd better rinse that stain before putting the shirt in the washing machine.

definitions.definition: To remove soap from (something) using water.
definitions.example: Rinse the dishes after you wash them.

definitions.definition: To thoroughly defeat in an argument, fight or other competition.
